profile.name: Pavan Kumar Dharmoju
profile.title: Building AI that works
profile.bio: I build AI systems that work in the real world. Currently at Marketing Attribution LLC, part of a 6-person team developing optimization software that turns complex marketing data into actionable insights for brands.

work.description: Part of a 6-person team developing optimization software that turns complex marketing data into actionable insights for brands.
Built RAG systems for biomedical research, processing 6M+ papers.

work.company: Northwestern University - Feinberg School of Medicine
work.description: Teaching computers to detect eye diseases with 95% accuracy.
Automating enterprise workflows and building data pipelines.
